'''''Mageblade Corrouge''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Hat Jellyfish|text=Mageblade Corrouge — With the Purewater Tide It Came}}.

==Trivia==
* The name "Corrouge" is the sword of Sir Otuel of Spain, a knight who sometimes appears alongside {{w|Roland}}, one of the principal figures in the literary cycle known as the {{w|Matter of France}}.
